title: Week 1: Course Introduction and Machine Learning Overview
description: Introduction to machine learning, its history, and applications. Students will learn the foundational definitions and relevance of machine learning.

title: Week 2: Data Preprocessing Techniques
description: Focus on data cleaning techniques, normalization methods, and handling missing values to prepare data for analysis.

title: Week 3: Feature Engineering
description: Exploration of feature selection processes and dimensionality reduction techniques to enhance model performance.

title: Week 4: Supervised Learning - Regression
description: Introduction to supervised learning techniques with an emphasis on linear and logistic regression models.

title: Week 5: Supervised Learning - Classification
description: Examination of classification methods, focusing on decision trees and k-Nearest Neighbors algorithms.

title: Week 6: Ensemble Methods
description: Understanding ensemble learning techniques, specifically random forests and boosting methods to improve predictive performance.

title: Week 7: Neural Networks
description: Basics of neural networks including their architecture and training methodologies for machine learning applications.

title: Week 8: Advanced Supervised Learning Techniques
description: Diving into advanced supervised learning methods such as Support Vector Machines and deep learning architectures.

title: Week 9: Fall Break
description: No classes scheduled for this week.

title: Week 10: Unsupervised Learning - Clustering
description: Introduction to clustering methods, focusing on k-Means and hierarchical clustering techniques.

title: Week 11: Unsupervised Learning - Dimensionality Reduction
description: Exploration of dimensionality reduction methodologies including Principal Component Analysis (PCA) and t-SNE.

title: Week 12: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
description: Advanced concepts in deep learning including architectures such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and their applications.

title: Week 13: Reinforcement Learning
description: Introduction to the principles of Reinforcement Learning and its applications in machine learning.

title: Week 14: Ethics in Machine Learning
description: Examination of ethical considerations in machine learning, focusing on algorithmic bias and data privacy, supported by case studies.

title: Week 15: Capstone Project Work
description: Collaborative planning and execution of the capstone project, including peer feedback sessions to enhance project development.

title: Week 16: Capstone Project Presentations
description: Final presentations and assessment of the capstone projects, showcasing the application of learned concepts in real-world scenarios.
